[[b]]MELEE TOUGHNESS[[/b]]

 Determines how resistant a unit is against melee attacks.

 Defined by:
 - Hit Points
 - Armour - Base
 - Armour - Shield
 - Melee Evasion - Base
 - Melee Evasion - Shield
